summary: Completed testing of Order Management pages (Profile, MyOrders, OrderDetails) for GAZ MAN e-commerce app. All features working correctly including full order flow and status timeline.

ui_bugs.issue: Stats cards show 0 for Commandes/En cours/Livrées even when user has orders - stats are hardcoded to 0

issues: Product images show industrial/technical photos instead of actual gas cylinder images - images are not relevant to the gas cylinder e-commerce context (noted in previous iteration)
ESLint warning: useEffect has missing dependency 'fetchOrder' - minor code quality issue

action_items: Consider making Profile stats dynamic by fetching actual order counts from API
Fix ESLint warning in OrderDetails.js by adding fetchOrder to useEffect dependencies or using useCallback
critical_code_review_comments: Profile.js line 109-119: Stats are hardcoded to 0 - should fetch actual order counts
OrderDetails.js line 22: ESLint warning about missing dependency in useEffect

success_rate.frontend: 100% (all pages render correctly, full order flow works)

seed_data_creation: Created test users and orders during testing with unique UUIDs
context_for_next_testing_agent: Order management pages (Profile, MyOrders, OrderDetails) are fully functional. Full flow tested: Register -> Add to cart -> Checkout -> Order Success -> Profile -> My Orders -> Order Details. Order status timeline shows 4 steps correctly: Commande reçue, En préparation, En livraison, Livrée. Currency is FCFA. UI is in French. Backend order APIs (GET /api/orders, GET /api/orders/{id}, POST /api/orders) all working correctly with proper authentication and authorization.

elements_verified: Menu items: Mes Commandes, Mes Adresses, Paramètres, Aide & Support, Confidentialité
Coming soon badges on disabled menu items
Order cards with order ID, status badge, date, articles count, total amount
Order header with ID and date
Status timeline with 4 steps (Commande reçue, En préparation, En livraison, Livrée)
Delivery information section (address, phone, payment method)
Order items list with product image, name, size, quantity, price

steps_verified: Checkout with phone and payment method
